system.effect: A deafened character automatically fails all Tests based on hearing (Awareness to hear, etc.). Opposed Social Skill Tests suffer a -10 penalty due to difficulty in communication.
system.removal: Removed when hearing is restored through medical attention or when the deafening effect ends.
